caption: BEST VEGAN FOOD AROUND.. ATE THERE 200 TIMES at least.. never disappoints

Awesome staff with awesome service. They ran out of something and exhausted every measure to try and rectify the situation. Food was great too, onky downer is that the burgers didn't come with fries! 😅
Man!!!!! The food was so good!.... I thought I was cheating on my vegan diet. This is the new Lunch spot for Liv’s Barbershop!
Love their crispy chicken sandwich and chicken nuggets 👌🏽honestly couldn’t even tell they were vegan
The best Impossible Burger. Other stuff also great. Food can be a little slow coming out, but just cool your jets, its worth it. Nice young owners
The food was delicious! Service was fantastic and they played great music, too. Couldn't have asked for anything better.
Best beyond burger in bk. Always great service with personal touch. 5 stars.
AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE. FOOD WAS PHENOMENAL. I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND EVERYONE EAT THERE
Black owend vegan comfort food,  can't lose!!
This place is actually two thumbs up
Good place
The food is bomb 💣 the service is professional and exceptional. They are the nicest and beautiful people ever.
I love their Buffalo chicken sandwich and sweet potato fries. Its a chill place with great vegan food.
Good music, good food and the owner was extra sweet in making sure everything was perfect.
American Vegan is delicious and has the dopest staff who create a very warm & welcoming environment :)
Great vegan nuggets. Will definitely order again.
The beyond burger, sweet potato fries, & cacao smoothie were amazing! I've never been treated so kindly as a customer. Definitely going back soon!
GOD BLESS YOU! Your food is absolutely delicious!! The Falafel Burger, Waffle Fries and PB&J are my favorite so far. Thank you 🙏🏽
Excellent food! The burgers are great and their waffle fries are amazing. Also great smoothies. Nice outdoor seating area too.
Great food , quick service pleasant staff.
Shame on you, G Maps.  I have never been here.  American Vegan, indeed!

I would order from this place, but the proprietor parks their car at the curb (for free) during #openstreets for restaurants. It makes no sense. Nourish, right across the street, is booming. Using the curb for tables. ¯_(ツ)_/¯
Food is amazing 😉. Love the Beyond burger 🍔 and the great customer service!  Drop by this place when you’re in the neighborhood!  It’s worth the trip!
Great food and awesome people!
Had the Buffalo chicken sandwich.  It was delicious, especially the chicken patty, but pricey for the size. Cookies are really great chewy texture, surprisingly delicious.

We went super late when it was really busy and waited a long time for our juice and smoothie. It was long enough that my housemates were starting to get very grumpy. However, when we got them, they both said they were amazing and well worth the wait. So tasty!!! We got the brain storm and a carrot orange pineapple juice. Highly recommend both! Also excellent vibe.

This is definitely my spot the food is very delicious and tasty and so are the smoothies even when the food is cold is really good that's how good this place is I will be going back very soon me and my niece attended this restaurant and the service is pretty good also my niece absolutely loved the food

I ordered for pick up through postmates just 1 burger. I got a confirmation message that my order will be ready in 20 minutes. After 2o min I was told,that my order will be ready in 5-10 more minutes.. ok,I decided to wait more. I waited 10 more minutes,but order was not ready and I was told it'll be ready in 2 min. After 5 min more,I was told again they are making it and it's almost ready. So in total I waited 50 minutes since placing my order,my order was not ready and postmates doesnt want to cancel my order and return me my money. Terrible experience
Amazing place so few true the rights vegan places and this die hard and my horizon from earth
Amazing Burgers!  So much better than Bare Burger Impossible Burger, and vegan . Excellent fresh juices. Nice people too. Love it here .
Amazing vegan food.
Very rude personal.
Super tasty, great service

Cashier wasn't wearing a mask at all. The guys working in the back had masks under their noses or around their chins. The food is delicious, and the staff is nice, but I'm waiting for the pandemic to end before coming back here.

I ordered through Uber eats, expecting a tasty bratwurst sandwich, beyond burger, fries and a side salad. Unfortunately my entire experience with this restaurant was marred through an incorrect order. I was given a burnt beyond burger, charred fries, a salad without a fork, and a missing sandwich. It's very unfortunate that I could not give a positive review of a vegan restaurant in NYC. Being vegan for two years, I try my best to support full vegan restaurants. However, I recommend to everyone to avoid this restaurant at all costs. Please try another restaurant that truly cares about supporting it's patrons.

There sweet potato waffle fries are to die for and the beyond burger yum! A little expensive for a burger ($15) and fries ($4) but as soon as I ate it...It made me forget! I’ll definitely go back because ummm YUM.
I ordered from uber eats ,you guys confirmed my order and it was picked up and failed to be delivered. A waste of time

American Vegan makes THE MOST DELICIOUS burger—wow. The waffle fries are also great. And the cookies are pretty much to-die-for. But the best part of all? The customer service!  When my order via Seamless came tonight without my paid-for fries, the gentleman at the restaurant who answered the phone when I called actually promised to hand-deliver them himself—something I could tell was totally outside his daily responsibilities at the restaurant and definitely not part of his job description. Within 30 minutes, he not only arrived with the fries, but he also gave me, for free, three of those heavenly cookies—a really kind gesture to help make things right. (He already had me at the personal delivery, of course. But I admit, the cookies were a really nice and much-appreciated touch.)  Well, if there’s one thing I love, it’s great service, so American Vegan can count me as their newest fan.  Give this restaurant your business: they deserve it. And, your tastebuds won’t be disappointed!

Just a half block from Freemont, the American Vegan is a touch of class, with a reasonable price tag. Quiet street side patio, for wine, salad, and other vegetarian choices. The street has little traffic and good for people watching. Great service. Inside it is a classic "old-timey" restaurant / bar.
Great food and great friendly staff. They let us set up a table outside and enjoy a little outdoor dining. Definitely  will be back.
this place was deliiiiiish. i can't stop thinking about the fries and the killer nuggets i had! i cannot wait to go back. plus, the staff was super sweet.
Always great, friendly service. Peace to the brothers who work there. I highly recommend their purple smoothie.
The music being played was inappropriate.  It seemed as if wvery ither word was f**k. When mentioned to the server, he was nonchalant and didn't address it
Unprofessional angry staff members.

Went there after working task rabbit for 8+ hours. I didn't eat all day and I was feeling for a smoothies. Luckily this place was open and i went there with my task partner and went both got a smoothie and i added a juice to my order. This place did not disappoint at all. The smoothie had the perfect sweetness to it. The staff are very friendly and kind. I'd definitely be going back once lock down is lifted
Just got an order delivered from here and the vegan burger was f* awesome! I’m not a vegan but totally loved it!
incredible owner, service, and also distancing standards. ive never had a vegan buffalo chicken sandwich this good. it’s so crispy and well flavored. i love it. lives up to expectations!!!!!!!!!
The staff is so kind and the burger I had was incredible!!

I'm not a vegan type of person but their fries are delicious. Very fun atmosphere. Music is poppin. Employees are engaging and funny. When I'm there the beyond burger is always the rave. Should definitely check it out.
The food is flavorful and prepared nicely. The staff is welcoming and accommodating to your needs. For the vegan options in the neighborhood, this is it!

I’ve  been fully vegan for over 3+ years and am always looking for places that serve delicious vegan dishes!  I found American Vegan a few months ago and their burgers are to LIVE for!!! I love a sloppy burger with all of the fixings and this place does not disappoint!  Don’t get me started on the sweet potato waffle fries...yummmmm!  The vibe of the restaurant is so cool and down to Earth and they always have a chill playlist going every time I come in.  My absolute favorite meal to get is the Red Quinoa burger w/a side of sweet potato waffle fries!  These burgers are serious eats so come with an appetite and get ready to chow down!!  Oh, and I almost forgot they make delicious smoothies too!!!  If you’re looking for a bomb burger (if you’re vegan or not) then you found the right place!

This place was very disappointing. The smoothie I ordered took the person about 20 minutes to make, and it was not busy at all. The smoothie did not include kale, which was listed as an ingredient on the menu. Food prep area was not sanitary (headphones laying on the cutting board where they prep fruit). Guy poured a bunch of agave syrup in the smoothie to make it sweeter even though it wasn't in the ingredients and I didn't ask for it. The consistency was more like a juice. Did not feel nutritious at all. I'm always glad to see vegan restaurants but I'll never go back here.
Tasty vegan food but expensive.

I ordered food through seamless and although seamless took forever they let me come and pick up my food they were very accommodating even though it wasn't their mistake the food was ready on time. I arrived ate a delicious meal and then ordered some food to go because I needed to eat this at home to fully enjoy the food coma
My meal was mad to order. I loved it and will go back again.  Gluten free!

The American Vegan was amazing. The staff are friendly, knowledgeable and patience. It was my first time in the establishment and it was the best first time experience. I had the Red Quinoa Burger. The burger was cut up and put on a bed a of arugula greens with diced tomatoes and thinly slice cucumbers serviced with a strawberry vinergrette, mayo, ketchup, mustard and chopped pickles on the side.  It was delicious! I will be back will friends.
Loved the Buffalo Chicken Sandwich (vegan). It definitely tastes like the real thing.
OMG, I had to ask them, is this vegan? I had the Quinoa Burger and the waffle fries, it was so tasty, I had it w/  sweet chili sauce. The seasonings were spot on. I will be dining there again!!!
Love the food! The Buffalo Chikn burger was very creative and I always love eating sweet potato waffle fries! It's the type of place to go for a quick bite or even a chill hangout.

Really good AND cheap vegan food :D I’ve gone many times here and also ordered takeout. My favorite is the beyond burger and the falafel burger. The waffle fries are also great.  Sad that they run out of things often like the fried chicken (it’s a small establishment). I love the vibe here, the staff is lively and sometimes they’re a little slow but that’s ok haha they’re nice.
So delicious, I love this place. Spectacular.
The falafel burger and sweet potato fries are really good. AND the customer service is stellar. I mean like really good. I love this place.

This is my new go to vegan spot!!! American vegan is "The American Vegan Restaurant"!! The Staff are very Friendly from the wait staff to the cooks, and the food is sensational! I highly recommend this spot, from the fresh fruit smoothies made right in front of me to the mouth watering menu options!! GO THERE NOW! OPEN till 2 am on Friday and Saturday and until 11pm weeknight. Take out for dinner? Go here!!!

AMAZING!!!!!!!! This spot has amazing food. The falafel burger and the red Quinoa burger was beyond anything I've tasted and great customer service!!!!! The brainstorm smoothie was soooooo delicious!!!!!! Everyone close by or travel its worth it!!!!
Delicious food. Timely service.
Sweet potato waffle fries are a must try

The food was good, fries are cool (waffle fries) I just wish the cashiers knew more about the menu and they listened to instructions a little more. We asked to remove some things off the burger and of course they were there. Plus, open late so yes definitely a 3 stars.
A hidden gem in Brooklyn good food and pleasant staff

(Translated by Google) Vegan burgers very good. The textures very well achieved and tasted good. The right price To put some fault on the establishment, I can comment, that the door closed badly and in the middle of November it entered very cold. It is also not a very large place, the tables are somewhat small.  (Original) Hamburguesas veganas muy buenas. Las texturas muy bien conseguidas y tenían buen sabor. El precio correcto. Por poner alguna pega sobre el establecimiento, puedo comentar, que la puerta cerraba mal y en pleno mes de noviembre entraba mucho frío. Además no es un lugar muy grande, las mesas son algo pequeñas.

My husband had the Beyond Burger. It was fantastic. So flavorful. I had the Spicy Chipotle Chicken. I loved it. The guys behind the counter were so friendly. Space was a bit tight but the food made it worth it. Definitely coming back!

I’m shocked by the positive reviews on here. This place is so filthy, there were dead roaches scattered across the windowsill, actual black crud all over the floor and rug, and dried liquid stains on the window. The “arugula salad” is a bowl of $7 rotting arugula with mushy grape tomatoes and a cup of oil on the side. The staff comes in wearing slippers and pajamas with their stomachs exposed. They have all their electronics plugged in all over the store. It’s so disgusting I’m surprised the health department hasn’t shut them down. Do not eat the food there.

My family and I came into American Vegan for my birthday dinner a few weeks ago. The food was absolutely amazing; to quote my mother, the sweet potato fries were "so good I want to cry." Not to mention the small business vibe, which was wonderful! We love to support real, local Brooklynites. The customer service was wonderful--the owners were so friendly and talked to us and served us our food as fast as they could. I was so happy to have found such a gem! 10/10 highly recommend!
Thank you for my guilty pleasure! Beyond tasty!! Beyond kind and lovely service.
Nothing extra.  But ok if you want something quick.

I’m confused as to how this place received so many stars . Everyone kept ordering the beyond burger which seems to be the only good thing on the menu .  The girl at the counter was extremely rude !! Almost intimidating she made me feel bad for asking questions . Finally, I ordered the chicken nuggets with a salad . The nuggets were sooo hard and dry and the salad wasn’t anything spectacular . The bathroom is GROSS !  I really wanted to like this place unfortunately , that wasn’t the case . I can fry my own beyond burger at home for less cost .

Solid food, nice people, could use some amenities. Food is most important, so four stars. But burgers and finger food need a plate on which to crumble, not a dirty plastic platter. Weak AC on a 90 degree day. Clean out the clutter and mess please!
Crispy chicken buffalo sandwich was amazing, sweet potato fries were the best I’ve had!
Best falafel burger ever
The ambiance mixed with the great food served with smiles makes this the spot! Plus its opened late!
Kind staff, good environment, chicken nuggets like dried out cardboard.

Omg it is so amazing to find a place like this in this neighborhood!! All vegan, delicious, affordable, and open late!!!  The food is amazing and worth the wait (everything is made to order). I haven't had their smoothies, salads, or desserts yet, but the buffalo "chicken" sandwich and the Beyond Meat and red quinoa burgers are beyond satisfying, as are their waffle fries!  The staff is all very kind and friendly, too. This has become my new go-to spot, especially when I get home late from a long day at work. Soooo glad they are here!!!! Please support them so they can stay on Vanderbilt forever!!!
So good!
The food was amazing. The gentleman working was super friendly and accommodating. Thank you for a wonderful late night vegan meal. Cheese waffle fries, buffalo chicken sandwich was the best.
Small with a condensed menu but great food with large portions.

This place is very very hit or miss. Sometimes the food is good and the service is decent, and other times its really bad. I went there with my family as a special night out, we decided to go to American Vegan since we have had it and it has been pretty good before. Anyway we waited 50 minutes for our food. 50 minutes! For whatever reason my order was wrong and on top of that their "Crispy Chicken Sandwich" Was legit MorningStar Veggie pattys. The fries were seemingly old and re cooked. They tasted burnt. When its good its great! Its really good if you are Vegetarian/Vegan, this is a good spot when the service is better. They really need to improve their service. The other times I have been there I have ordered the Veggie Burger and it is really good. I would give it a 2/5 out of 5 but I'm pretty sure you can't do that on Google Maps.
Come to this spot regularly

If you’re looking for a vegan spot or just a healthy place to eat, I would suggest stopping by here. Its a bit hard to find but definitely worth checking out. They have tables and bar style seating. In addition to burgers and sausages, they also have “chicken” sandwiches, grilled cheese, and juices. I also highly recommend their sweet potato fries which are seasoned! I usually am pretty wary of vegan food but their beyond burger and falafel burger were delicious

Honestly this place is like a hidden gem! I had the Beyond Burger and waffle fries and it was delicious. My boyfriend had the Red Quinoa Burger and Sweet Potato Waffle Fries. Let me just tell you, the sweet potato waffle fries is the best thing I had in NY. They were DELICIOUS. Definitely coming back whenever I am in town!!!
Good burger! I got the gluten free bun and was BLOWN AWAY by how delicious it is. Small place, but good vibes. I’ll be back.
Authentic and full of flavor, both in food and atmosphere. Thank you for the sustenance.
Great food. Little bit of a wait, but it's worth it
They are awesome here. Food is great. Artwork decor, I love. I always feel welcome here and love bringing my non vegan friends to try some great plant based burgers. 😊
The chef puts his heart into everything he cooks and the servers are very very attentive and caring. will definitely be returning.
Very dingy, and it smells funny. The floors seriously needs to be mopped. My food was good though. I was nervous about eating it though because like I said the place needs cleaning.

Wow! The guy at the register really helped me out to figure out what was the best option to get. I landed on the falafel burger with gluten free bun, sweet potato fries, and a smoothie full of spinach with peanut butter and cinnamon! All of these were absolutely delicious! The gf bun didn’t crumble to bits when I took a bite of that giant burger. The SP fries were cooked in maple syrup and cinnamon, from what I could tell. It made for a phenomenal pairing with ketchup. The smoothie was a bit watery at first, but delicious. The man offered to remake it. I hadn’t said anything but he could tell somehow. Prices are pretty standard. I hope to get back to try other items.  Only downsides are: No signage outside made it hard to find & might be why it’s not super busy (though it was a Wednesday evening), bathroom lock doesn’t really work so well, but there is a bathroom!

It’s $6 for a 2 pack of beyond burgers at Whole Foods. Why would I come Here and pay double ? Lmao these   vegan places need to step it up and stop Taxing on plant based food, idc if the rent is too damn high either. 💯
The best burger I've ever had!!! 💝
Very good. You carnivores could probably handle this.

We stopped by American Vegan while we were driving through the neighborhood to grab a quick bite for lunch. It's a small counter service restaurant with three cramped tables and a bar. It has a very casual atmosphere with good music. The sweet potato fries are magical, first of all. I also had the Buffalo chicken sandwich and it was tasty too. Gender neutral bathroom.
GO VEGAN!!! 🌱 very tasty 😋
Music is so good 😊! Food is so tasty 😋
The best restaurant ever! So effectient & yummy food!

1. SLOOOOOW review. 30 minutes for two burgers and 3 smoothies. That's a joke. 2. Forgot about an item I ordered. And when I told the girl that she forgot it, all she said was "it's not on the receipt". Didn't even apologize! 3. Uncaring, unapologetic, spaced-out service. 4. I asked for utensils.  Did she put them? NO!
Great place to eat!
The NICEST people and amazing food I want them to adopt me. Best thing in 2019 !!!

I wish I wanted to give 5 stars but it’s just not enough food for the price. I always order the beyond burger and it literally looks like a kids burger lol the side of waffle fries is so small and it’s the only type of fries they have. It tastes good and all but the menu just seems incomplete and I always end up hungry.

Great new vegan place in the neighborhood! They have smoothies, sandwiches, and a few desserts. Prices are very reasonable for the area and staff is incredibly friendly. If you like comfort food, then this should hit the spot.
Place was closed when the hrs on Google said open. When I opened the door all employees were getting high and had a terrible attitude towards me asking me to leave. I do t think I’ll try again.

Food was great. I got the falafel burger and my girlfriend got the buffalo chicken sandwich and sweet potato waffle fries. I’m not a vegan, but surprisingly the burger was really good. I also tried some of the buffalo chicken and with the sauce you can barely tell it’s not chicken.  The only downside is the incredibly slow service. The place wasn’t busy at all, but it took us nearly 30 mins to get our food, and the fries didn’t come until 15 mins after that. I would advise calling ahead to make an order so it’s ready faster.
#veggie
friendly place.and those vegan burgers are great.....check it out
Family owned businesses! Support your locals
Amazing vegan bratwurst dog! Best veggie dog I’ve ever eaten. Please go and try for yourself!

There are no pictures because the food was so amazing, I was IN THE MOMENT with my BURGER. I went there yesterday for a late dinner, but I daydreamed about this burger all day today (which is why I felt compelled to write this review) I got the mushroom special burger, AMAZING! with gluten free bread (thank you for having that for folks allergic to gluten!!!) and it came with waffle fries and the friendly staff gave me extra pickles too. This was around $13 (but they prob charged more for the gf bread), which is pricey but this area sort of is... I was not aware but they close at 9 though so try to be out by then! Workers wanna go home... REMEMBER TO TIP! Thanks for reading.

Loved the falafel burger!  flavorful. The chef's are personable ,quite humble and polite. The Juices are clear pulp free which i prefer.  Calm , quiet and friendly patrons feels like a community.  Definitely recommend.

This place recently popped up in my neighborhood and I decided to give it a try. I purchased two cookies, a large smoothie, and the beyond burger with waffle fries. It was delicious. Everything was cooked perfectly and the ingredients were fresh. The smoothie was soooo good. I’ll definitely will be stopping by again!
Smoothie was warm and watery.
Nutritious & delish !
This place is amazing! The beyond burger and chicken sandwich are to die for!! Takes a bit of time to make, but well worth the wait!! Yasssss Vegan!!!!
Very good and varied veggie burgers—from falafel-based to “beyond beef”. Excellent waffle fries. Extremely good vibe. Owner and staff are very friendly and low-key but devoted to excellence.
Appreciate this being an all vegan spot, but the prices are absolutely unjustified for the amount & quality of what you're getting. Brooklyn Standard has subs that are larger and cheaper

I don’t know what the lady before is talking about but I’ve never experienced that service at American Vegan. They always ask if a smoothie juice or food is okay and will make it over if you’re not satisfied . It gets kind of busy in there which is understandable because it’s really good so it’s worth the wait if you do have to wait. The staff is really respectful they always have base options such as Coconut milk , Almond milk , Soy milk , etc. Food is never cold and it’s child friendly. Their smoothies are really really good especially the Purple Amazon. So far I had the spicy buffalo chicken sandwich, beyond burger , waffle fries , sweet potato waffle fries , açaí bowl , bratwurst sausage and I’m ready to try more . They never disappoint I recommend this place to anyone vegan or going vegan very clean and did I mention the staff is friendly engaged in conversation with them, great people.

My husband and I stumbled upon this place and we’re so excited to see a new vegan restaurant in the neighborhood. First off, you can’t call a restaurant vegan if you are serving cheddar cheese on your burgers. Secondly, the service here sucks. I ordered a veggie burger, while I waited I noticed the servers forgetting people’s orders and telling them what they ran out of. My husband brought a smoothie and the only options they had was grapefruit or almond milk as the base. Now if this was a true vegan restaurant they would know that there are way more options as a base for a smoothie. When the smoothie came it was bitter and tasted like they put grapefruit only. A waiter came towards us with a bag then she said oh sorry this is not your order. She went to the back and told the chef that we were waiting for our food and the chef told her that she never gave him the order so he never started to cook our food. While waiting, I watched one of the workers go to the store because they ran out of kale. She came back with BAGGED KALE. This is a big no no for me because bagged kale is unhealthy and any true vegan would know that. She brought it, put it in a bowl and began to make a smoothie with it without washing it. When I finally got my burger, I took a bite and it was cold. This restaurant not only has poor customer service, they also need to educate themselves on the true meaning of vegan and the care and thought it takes to have an authentic vegan restaurant. I’m not sure if this place is new but I hope they get it together soon because people will give them a chance once but will never come back.
Nice atmosphere there

So excited to have a new vegan spot in my neighborhood. I tried it for the first time yesterday and I will definitely be returning. I had the Buffalo "chicken" sandwich and it was AMAZING. Waffle fries were yummy too. Great comfort food and I definitely recommend.
Amazing vegan burgers!
Awesome food!
Cool place with great food and service. So happy I found this place.
Falafel burger is Devine. Also tried their lentil thing (I forgot what it was exactly) and it was also very very good. So happy more vegan places are opening up around here!

Truly amazing restaraunt! I am newly vegan, coupled with being very indecisive and the owner was so patient with me and helped me chose what to order. Ended up getting the beyond burger and it was so good!! Will be coming here often, would suggest for vegan and non vegan folks!
I’m not even vegan but awesome place. I love the waffle fries!!

it was my first experience at a vegan resturant  . my first order was a beyond burger with waffle fries and it blew my mind! i definitely recommend going to this vegan restaurant even if you're not vegan. it will change your mind about vegan food completly!

Beautiful place... beautiful atmosphere!! Great owners.. better food!! Everything on the menu ie excellent! But my favorite is the waffle fries and  buffalo chicken burger! Try it for yourself!! Just what this neighborhood needed!! 5 stars!
Awesome NEW vegan spot for the neighborhood. Impossible burger for $12, $10 for reeeeeally good Buffalo Chik’n sandwich. Nice owners & a dope spot. I’ll be back.
